participant_1.name: George
participant_1.personality: George is a passionate and dedicated bee farmer who cherishes the simple pleasures in life. He has a humorous side, often finding joy in the buzz of his bees.
participant_1.background: my favorite food is papaya. i married a super model from italy. i have zero family that i'm close to. i am a bee farmer. my name is george.

participant_2.name: Larry
participant_2.personality: Larry is creative and adventurous, with a zest for life both in the kitchen and outdoors. He has a vivid imagination and enjoys sharing his love for cooking and fishing.
participant_2.background: if i'm not cooking in the kitchen then i'm definitely on the water. l also love comic books. i love cooking but i also enjoy fishing. hey my name is larry and i am a chef. spiderman is my favorite.

content.text: hello my name is utku nice to meet you
